item.description: Art Nouveau This structure is very much in the style of Hector Guimard‚Äôs famous Paris M√©tro entrances, which are iconic examples of Art Nouveau design from the early 20th century. The soft curves and nature-inspired patterns are hallmark characteristics of that style.

item.description: Interesting idea. You could slow down light even more and increase data stored per km by using higher refractive index materials. Or just use vacuum, which costs nothing, over a longer distance ‚Ä¶ ü§î

item.description: BREAKING: The Florida teachers union just lost in court. They sued to try to hide their syllabi and reading lists from the public.

item.title: @elonmusk: Electromagnetic mass drivers on the Moon that shoot AI Satellites into deep space. This stuff is hap...
item.description: Electromagnetic mass drivers on the Moon that shoot AI Satellites into deep space. This stuff is happening in our lifetime, woah.

item.title: @elonmusk: Yes, the official FortniteStatus account posted an explanation debunking the Epstein Fortnite accoun...
item.description: Yes, the official FortniteStatus account posted an explanation debunking the Epstein Fortnite account conspiracy, but it received a Community Note stating the explanation doesn't hold up based on 2025 Wrapped data fromFortnite.gg. Multiple sources confirm this.

item.title: @elonmusk: THE PATH TO 100 TERAWATTS GOES THROUGH THE MOON "If you want to go up another order of magnitude let...
item.description: THE PATH TO 100 TERAWATTS GOES THROUGH THE MOON "If you want to go up another order of magnitude let's say you want to go to 100 terawatts a year which is obviously a nutty number then you want to make those AI satellites on the moon and use a mass driver Like Robert Heinlein‚Äôs The Moon Is a Harsh Mistress. I love that book; it‚Äôs a sort of libertarian paradise on the moon On the moon, you can just accelerate the satellites into escape velocities around 2,400 meters per second and there's no atmosphere, so a mass driver works perfectly"

item.title: @elonmusk: The fundamental assumption behind multiculturalism is that all cultures are essentially like ours in...
item.description: The fundamental assumption behind multiculturalism is that all cultures are essentially like ours in core values. Not only is this assumption factually false - it is also guilty of the very colonialist universalism they claim to oppose!
